long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash your productivity with our new Chrome extension, HyperFocus! Say goodbye to distractions and hello to focus with our simple yet powerful tool. 

HyperFocus blocks non-productive websites and helps you stay focused on your work. With just one click, you can block websites that waste your time, so you can be more productive and get more done.
